title:
Estimation and Control of Motor Core Temperature with Online Learning of
  Thermal Model Parameters: Application to Musculoskeletal Humanoids
authors:
Kento Kawaharazuka and Naoki Hiraoka and Kei Tsuzuki and Moritaka
  Onitsuka and Yuki Asano and Kei Okada and Koji Kawasaki and Masayuki Inaba
abstract:
The estimation and management of motor temperature are important for the
continuous movements of robots. In this study, we propose an online learning
method of thermal model parameters of motors for an accurate estimation of
motor core temperature. Also, we propose a management method of motor core
temperature using the updated model and anomaly detection method of motors.
Finally, we apply this method to the muscles of the musculoskeletal humanoid
and verify the ability of continuous movements.
